actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Big Linda makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 33 (4d12 + 7 damage) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Big Linda can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Acid Spew {@recharge 5}
entries: Big Linda spews acid in a 30 foot cone. Each creature in that line of fire must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 (11d8 damage) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
